title: Fed Stays in Holding Pattern, Election Legal Issues
itunes:title: Fed Stays in Holding Pattern, Election Legal Issues
description:
We break down the FOMC Rate Decision with Bloomberg News Global Economics and Policy Editor Kathleen Hays and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson. Iona College Professor and Bloomberg News Political Contributor Jeanne Zaino discusses the latest on the election results in key states. Bloomberg News Senior International Affairs Reporter Marc Champion talks about his story “Make America Boring Again, Fix Its Dated Electoral System.” Derek Muller, Professor of Law at the University of Iowa College of Law, walks through legal issues surrounding the election results. And Bloomberg Opinion Politics Columnist Jonathan Bernstein shares his view on issues Republicans face with winning the popular vote.

Hosts: Carol Massar, June Grasso, and Kevin Cirilli. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
